filmography.title: Wings
filmography.role_description: A doomed young pilot whose brief but memorable scene established Cooper's screen presence.
filmography.plot: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

filmography.title: The Virginian
filmography.role_description: A stoic ranch foreman who must uphold the law of the West, even if it means hanging his own friend for cattle rustling.
filmography.plot: A ranch foreman falls for a new schoolteacher from the East, but his strict code of honor tests their relationship.

filmography.title: Morocco
filmography.role_description: A carefree legionnaire who falls for a cabaret singer, sparking a romance amidst the heat of North Africa.
filmography.plot: A cabaret singer and a legionnaire fall in love, but their relationship is complicated by her wealthy suitor and his dangerous lifestyle.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: City Streets
filmography.role_description: A carnival shooting gallery worker who joins a bootlegging gang to impress his girlfriend, only to become trapped in the mob life.
filmography.plot: A racketeer's daughter urges her boyfriend to join the gang so he can make enough money to marry her.

filmography.title: A Farewell to Arms
filmography.role_description: An American ambulance driver in the Italian army during WWI who falls deeply in love with a British nurse.
filmography.plot: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

filmography.title: Design for Living
filmography.role_description: A painter who, along with his playwright friend, enters into a 'gentleman's agreement' to share a muse without sex, which naturally fails.
filmography.plot: A painter, a playwright, and a commercial artist enter into a platonic ménage à trois in Paris.

filmography.title: The Lives of a Bengal Lancer
filmography.role_description: A rebellious and experienced officer in the 41st Bengal Lancers who clashes with a rigid new replacement on the Northwest Frontier.
filmography.plot: British officers on the Northwest Frontier of India battle rebellious tribesmen and internal conflicts.

filmography.title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
filmography.role_description: A humble, tuba-playing poet from a small town who inherits a massive fortune and is beset by city slickers trying to exploit him.
filmography.plot: A small-town tuba player inherits a fortune and moves to the city, where he is hounded by greedy opportunists and a cynical reporter.

filmography.title: The Plainsman
filmography.role_description: The legendary gunslinger trying to stop gunrunners from selling rifles to the Cheyenne while romancing Calamity Jane.
filmography.plot: Wild Bill Hickok attempts to stop an Indian uprising that is being fueled by gun-runners.

filmography.title: Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
filmography.role_description: A wealthy American businessman who marries for the eighth time, only to meet his match in a determined French woman.
filmography.plot: A wealthy multi-millionaire marries his eighth wife, who is determined not to be divorced like her predecessors.

filmography.title: Beau Geste
filmography.role_description: One of three brothers who joins the French Foreign Legion to protect the family honor regarding a stolen sapphire.
filmography.plot: Three brothers join the French Foreign Legion to escape a scandal involving a stolen gem and face a tyrannical sergeant in the desert.

filmography.title: The Westerner
filmography.role_description: A drifting cowboy who forms an uneasy friendship with the corrupt Judge Roy Bean while trying to protect homesteaders.
filmography.plot: A drifter accused of horse stealing faces the hanging judge Roy Bean and tries to mediate a range war.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor (Walter Brennan)

filmography.title: Northwest Mounted Police
filmography.role_description: A Texas Ranger who travels to Canada to hunt for an outlaw, clashing with the Mounties over jurisdiction and methods.
filmography.plot: A Texas Ranger joins forces with the Royal Canadian Mounted Police to stop a rebellion and catch a murderer.

filmography.title: Meet John Doe
filmography.role_description: A former baseball player turned tramp who is hired to pose as a suicidal protestor, sparking a national political movement.
filmography.plot: A reporter invents a fake story about a suicide protest, and a homeless man is hired to play the part, becoming a national hero.

filmography.title: Sergeant York
filmography.role_description: A Tennessee pacifist who is drafted into WWI and becomes one of the most decorated American soldiers after a heroic act in the Argonne Forest.
filmography.plot: A hillbilly sharpshooter becomes a war hero despite his religious pacifism during World War I.

filmography.title: Ball of Fire
filmography.role_description: A strait-laced grammarian researching slang who falls for a nightclub stripper hiding from the mob.
filmography.plot: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to testify against her mobster boyfriend.

filmography.title: The Pride of the Yankees
filmography.role_description: The legendary New York Yankees first baseman whose iron-man career is cut short by a tragic illness.
filmography.plot: The story of the life and career of the famous baseball player Lou Gehrig.

filmography.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
filmography.role_description: An American teacher fighting in the Spanish Civil War who is tasked with blowing up a strategic bridge.
filmography.plot: During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a bridge.

filmography.title: Saratoga Trunk
filmography.role_description: A Texas gambler who teams up with an ambitious Creole woman to seek fortune and revenge in New Orleans and Saratoga.
filmography.plot: A Texas gambler and the daughter of a Creole aristocrat become lovers and partners as they try to make their fortunes.

filmography.title: Cloak and Dagger
filmography.role_description: A nuclear physicist recruited by the OSS to go on an undercover mission to Europe to rescue a scientist from the Nazis.
filmography.plot: A scientist is recruited by the OSS to contact a colleague in Switzerland and finds himself involved in a dangerous mission in Italy.

filmography.title: The Fountainhead
filmography.role_description: An uncompromising architect who refuses to conform to popular tastes or compromise his artistic vision.
filmography.plot: An individualistic architect chooses to struggle in obscurity rather than compromise his artistic and personal vision.

filmography.title: High Noon
filmography.role_description: A town marshal who is forced to face a gang of deadly killers alone on his wedding day when the townspeople refuse to help.
filmography.plot: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon.

filmography.title: Vera Cruz
filmography.role_description: An ex-Confederate soldier who teams up with a mercenary to escort a countess through revolutionary Mexico.
filmography.plot: During the Mexican Rebellion of 1866, an unsavory group of American adventurers are hired to escort a countess to Vera Cruz.

filmography.title: Friendly Persuasion
filmography.role_description: A Quaker father who struggles to maintain his family's pacifist values when the Civil War reaches their Indiana farm.
filmography.plot: A Quaker family in Indiana in 1862 struggles to retain their pacifist beliefs when the Civil War approaches their doorstep.

filmography.title: Love in the Afternoon
filmography.role_description: An aging American playboy in Paris who becomes intrigued by a young cello student who seems to know everything about his past.
filmography.plot: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him.

filmography.title: Man of the West
filmography.role_description: A reformed outlaw whose past catches up with him when he is held hostage by his former gang and forced to confront his violent nature.
filmography.plot: A former outlaw is forced by his old gang to participate in a train robbery, but he plans to turn the tables on them.
